name: No Service, No Safety
description:
"No Service, No Safety" is a survival-horror game that takes place in a "lovely old couple's" house deep in the country. You play as a man who's car had crashed a block from this house and you need some shelter for the night. As the hours pass, strange things happen!

Download the game to support us. We only started a few years ago with low budget, and look at us now!(still bad)
